newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin closes 32 cents down at 14.48 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin closes 32 cents down at 14.48 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell 32 cents to 14.48 ringgit ($5.73) a kg, after huge selling by players tracking the lower close of the London Metal Exchange (LME) on Friday.
"The market seems to have overdone the LME's fall," said a dealer. "There was heavy offerings initially, and the price did not recover."

Buyers were from Europe and Malaysia. Turnover rose to 124 tonnes from 98 tonnes on Friday. The local price was trading at a discount of $85 a tonne over the LME, against a premium of $25 previously. - Barani Krishnaan (603-2307509) ($1=2.5280 ringgit)
